p: Well, Falming Rainbow, you were really "all a glow" on the Dick Cavet Show! Congratulations! I have been trying to get this note off to you for weeks and weeks._Now it is (July 20th)_another delay. House guests.
I have not even found time to edit the tapes I made of your TV Special.
Now, it's off to San Francisco again. So more delay- but I'll still keep trying- the Gods are bound to favor me again!
No reply to my letter of inquery to the Lord of Monthly Castle - so the mystery remains for polution in another day and time.
May the Grandfathers favor you and decree that we may meet again
